title: Atlético Deportivo Olímpico
text:
Atlético Deportivo Olímpico is a <a href="Peru">Peru</a>vian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, playing in the city of <a href="Callao">Callao</a>, <a href="Lima">Lima</a>, <a href="Peru">Peru</a>.
History.
The club was the 1970 <a href="Peruvian%20Segunda%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Peruvian Segunda División</a> champion.
The club have played at the highest level of Peruvian football in the <a href="1971%20Torneo%20Descentralizado">1971 Torneo Descentralizado</a>, but was relegated the same year.
